snippet: The Delaware Supreme Court has dismissed an appeal by Cooper Tire that had sought to require Apollo, of India, to complete a proposed $2.3 billion takeover of the American firm.
lead_paragraph: The Delaware Supreme Court has dismissed an appeal by Cooper Tire that had sought to require Apollo, of India, to complete a proposed $2.3 billion takeover of the American firm.

headline.main: Odds Grow for Apollo to Drop Tire Deal
headline.print_headline: Odds Grow for Apollo to Drop Tire Deal
